mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LED_PARA ( CSID, LEDID, TCPYCFWQIPDZ, YCTCPFWDK, SBYXKSRQ, SBYXJZRQ, XHSJDKSSJ, XHSJDJZSJ, SBWDFWKS, SBWDFWJZ, WBFSKS, WBFSJZ, HLFSKS, HLFSJZ, JWMKKS, JWMKJZ, KZMS, DWFW, SBGLBHKS, SBGLBHJZ, SBSJBH, SBFWZQ ) VALUES ( SYS_GUID (), '${ledid}', '${tcpycfwqipdz}', '${yctcpfwdk}', to_date('${sbyxksrq}', 'YYYY/MM/dd HH24:MI:SS'), to_date('${sbyxjzrq}', 'YYYY/MM/dd HH24:MI:SS'), '${xhsjdkssj}', '${xhsjdjzsj}', '${sbwdfwks}', '${sbwdfwjz}', '${wbfsks}', '${wbfsjz}', '${hlfsks}', '${hlfsjz}', '${jwmkks}', '${jwmkjz}', '${kzms}', '${dwfw}', '${sbglbhks}', '${sbglbhjz}', '${sbsjbh}', '${sbfwzq}' )
mapper.update: UPDATE LED_PARA SET TCPYCFWQIPDZ = #{tcpycfwqipdz}, YCTCPFWDK = #{yctcpfwdk}, SBYXKSRQ = TO_DATE (#{sbyxksrq},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), SBYXJZRQ = TO_DATE (#{sbyxjzrq}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), XHSJDKSSJ = #{xhsjdkssj}, XHSJDJZSJ = #{xhsjdjzsj}, SBWDFWKS = #{sbwdfwks}, SBWDFWJZ = #{sbwdfwjz}, WBFSKS = #{wbfsks}, WBFSJZ = #{wbfsjz}, HLFSKS = #{hlfsks}, HLFSJZ = #{hlfsjz}, JWMKKS = #{jwmkks}, JWMKJZ = #{jwmkjz}, KZMS = #{kzms}, DWFW = #{dwfw}, SBGLBHKS = #{sbglbhks}, SBGLBHJZ = #{sbglbhjz}, SBSJBH = #{sbsjbh}, SBFWZQ = #{sbfwzq} WHERE LEDID = #{ledid}
mapper.select: SELECT CSID AS "csid", LEDID AS "ledid", TCPYCFWQIPDZ AS "tcpycfwqipdz", YCTCPFWDK AS "yctcpfwdk", TO_CHAR(SBYXKSRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS "sbyxksrq", TO_CHAR(SBYXJZRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS "sbyxjzrq", XHSJDKSSJ AS "xhsjdkssj", XHSJDJZSJ AS "xhsjdjzsj", SBWDFWKS AS "sbwdfwks", SBWDFWJZ AS "sbwdfwjz", WBFSKS AS "wbfsks", WBFSJZ AS "wbfsjz", HLFSKS AS "hlfsks", HLFSJZ AS "hlfsjz", JWMKKS AS "jwmkks", JWMKJZ AS "jwmkjz", KZMS AS "kzms", DWFW AS "dwfw", SBGLBHKS AS "sbglbhks", SBGLBHJZ AS "sbglbhjz", SBSJBH AS "sbsjbh", SBFWZQ AS "sbfwzq" FROM LED_PARA WHERE LEDID = #{ledid}
mapper.delete: DELETE from LED_PARA where LEDID IN #{item}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LED_PARA ( CSID, LEDID, TCPYCFWQIPDZ, YCTCPFWDK, SBYXKSRQ, SBYXJZRQ, XHSJDKSSJ, XHSJDJZSJ, SBWDFWKS, SBWDFWJZ, WBFSKS, WBFSJZ, HLFSKS, HLFSJZ, JWMKKS, JWMKJZ, KZMS, DWFW, SBGLBHKS, SBGLBHJZ, SBSJBH, SBFWZQ ) ( SELECT SYS_GUID (), '${map.ledid}', '${map.tcpycfwqipdz}', '${map.yctcpfwdk}', to_date('${map.sbyxksrq}', 'YYYY/MM/dd HH24:MI:SS'), to_date('${map.sbyxjzrq}', 'YYYY/MM/dd HH24:MI:SS'), '${map.xhsjdkssj}', '${map.xhsjdjzsj}', '${map.sbwdfwks}', '${map.sbwdfwjz}', '${map.wbfsks}', '${map.wbfsjz}', '${map.hlfsks}', '${map.hlfsjz}', '${map.jwmkks}', '${map.jwmkjz}', '${map.kzms}', '${map.dwfw}', '${map.sbglbhks}', '${map.sbglbhjz}', '${map.sbsjbh}', '${map.sbfwzq}' FROM DUAL )
